Name: Trinity
About the game: Trinity is an atmospheric FPS/puzzle game set in a mysterious and surrealistic universe. In this game, you have the ability to give differents properties to platform to help the player navigate throught complex environment. This core mechanic will guide you in your journey and you will travel through a dozen of different levels about life and death and you will solve many puzzles that will challenge your logic while offering an engaging and immersive experience. - An innovating FPS/puzzle - An engaging experience with a beautiful and interesting artistic direction. - More that forty well thought puzzles that will challenge your skill.
